events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item delivered.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and here is the photo showing the wrong product I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund within 5-7 business days, and you can keep the wrong item as an apology.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer, I appreciate that you let me keep the item.
The refund has been initiated and should appear in your account shortly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us and we hope to serve you better next time.
